ComicInfo.Summary:
Captain Sable and her crew have overcome one danger after another in the pursuit of the galaxy's most valuable treasure. But now, with their goal within reach, all that stands between them and it is the deadliest pirate space has ever seen . . . the notorious Captain Blood.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Ian Richardson & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | D | Cover D | Robert Atkins & Grostieta | 4 | E | Dallas Fan Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Keith Garvey | Missing | F | Dallas Fan Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing | G | Dallas Fan Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Keith Garvey (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
